states.name: Uttarakhand
states.description: Uttarakhand is known for its sacred temples, scenic hill stations, peaceful valleys, and adventure destinations. From spiritual journeys like Char Dham to lakes, forests, and snow-covered mountains, it offers a perfect blend of devotion and nature.

popularPlaces.name: Nainital
popularPlaces.title: City of Lakes
popularPlaces.description: A beautiful hill station surrounded by mountains and centered around the famous Naini Lake. Perfect for families, couples, and nature lovers.
popularPlaces.bestTime: March to June, September to November

popularPlaces.name: Rishikesh
popularPlaces.title: Yoga Capital of the World
popularPlaces.description: A spiritual and adventure destination on the banks of the Ganga River. Famous for yoga, river rafting, and Ganga Aarti.

popularPlaces.name: Mussoorie
popularPlaces.title: Queen of Hills
popularPlaces.description: A romantic hill station with beautiful viewpoints, waterfalls, and pleasant weather.

popularPlaces.name: Auli
popularPlaces.title: Skiing Paradise
popularPlaces.description: A famous winter destination known for snow, skiing, and breathtaking Himalayan views.

spiritualTours.name: Char Dham Yatra
spiritualTours.description: A sacred pilgrimage covering four holy temples in Uttarakhand believed to bring spiritual peace and salvation.

places.name: Kedarnath
places.about: One of the holiest temples of Lord Shiva located in the Himalayas.

places.name: Badrinath
places.about: Famous temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu visited by thousands of devotees.

places.name: Gangotri
places.about: Origin of the holy river Ganga.

places.name: Yamunotri
places.about: Origin of the Yamuna river and sacred pilgrimage site.

states.name: Himachal Pradesh
states.description: Himachal Pradesh is famous for snow-covered mountains, peaceful valleys, adventure sports, and spiritual retreats. It is a perfect destination for honeymoon, adventure, and nature lovers.

popularPlaces.name: Manali
popularPlaces.title: Snow & Adventure Hub
popularPlaces.description: A top destination for honeymooners and adventure lovers surrounded by mountains and rivers.
popularPlaces.bestTime: October to February for snow, March to June for pleasant weather

popularPlaces.name: Shimla
popularPlaces.title: Queen of Hills
popularPlaces.description: A historic hill station known for colonial buildings, shopping streets, and scenic views.
popularPlaces.bestTime: March to June, December for snow

popularPlaces.name: Kasol
popularPlaces.title: Mini Israel of India
popularPlaces.description: A peaceful village known for trekking, nature, and riverside camping.

popularPlaces.name: Dharamshala
popularPlaces.title: Spiritual Retreat
popularPlaces.description: Home of the Dalai Lama known for monasteries, Tibetan culture, and peaceful environment.
popularPlaces.bestTime: March to June, September to November

spiritualPlaces.name: Manikaran Sahib
spiritualPlaces.about: Sacred Sikh pilgrimage site known for hot water springs.

spiritualPlaces.name: Chintpurni Temple
spiritualPlaces.about: One of the Shakti Peeth temples in Himachal.
